targets.rawSql:
-- ถ้า device_id เริ่มต้นด้วย EM500
IF ${device_id:singlequote} LIKE 'EM500-PT100-%' -- ลบ ' ' ออกจากรอบตัวแปร
BEGIN
    SELECT
    DATEADD(HOUR, -7, [Time]) as [Time],
    Device_ID,
    Temperature,
    Batt
    FROM EM500_PT100_Data
    WHERE [Time] >= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeFrom())
      AND [Time] <= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeTo())
      AND Device_ID = ${device_id:singlequote}
    ORDER BY [time] DESC;
END

-- ถ้า device_id เริ่มต้นด้วย EM320
ELSE IF ${device_id:singlequote} LIKE 'EM320-TH-%' -- ลบ ' ' ออกจากรอบตัวแปร
BEGIN
    SELECT
    DATEADD(HOUR, -7, [Time]) as [Time],
    Device_ID,
    Temperature,
    Humidity
    Batt
    FROM EM320_TH_Data
    WHERE [Time] >= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeFrom())
      AND [Time] <= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeTo())
      AND Device_ID = ${device_id:singlequote}
    ORDER BY Time DESC;
END

-- ถ้า device_id เริ่มต้นด้วย WS303
ELSE IF ${device_id:singlequote} LIKE 'WS303-%' -- ลบ ' ' ออกจากรอบตัวแปร
BEGIN
    SELECT
    DATEADD(HOUR, -7, [Time]) as [Time],
    Device_ID,
    Water_Status,
    Batt
    FROM WS303_Data
    WHERE [Time] >= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeFrom())
      AND [Time] <= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeTo())
      AND Device_ID = ${device_id:singlequote}
    ORDER BY Time DESC;
END

-- ถ้า device_id เริ่มต้นด้วย O3
ELSE IF ${device_id:singlequote} LIKE 'O3-%' -- ลบ ' ' ออกจากรอบตัวแปร
BEGIN
    SELECT
    DATEADD(HOUR, -7, [Time]) as [Time],
    Device_ID,
    O3
    FROM O3_Data
    WHERE [Time] >= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeFrom())
      AND [Time] <= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeTo())
      AND Device_ID = ${device_id:singlequote}
    ORDER BY Time DESC;
END

SELECT
    [timestamp],
    sd.site_name as site_id,
    temp as Temperature,
    humid as Humidity,
    (
                            SELECT TOP 1 
                                sub.battery 
                            FROM 
                                em320_th_data sub
                            WHERE 
                                sub.site_id = em32.site_id
                                AND sub.battery IS NOT NULL
                            ORDER BY 
                                sub.timestamp DESC
                        ) AS battery
FROM em320_th_data em32
LEFT JOIN site_detail sd
ON em32.site_id = sd.id
WHERE sd.site_name = ${site_id:singlequote} AND [timestamp] >= $__timeFrom()
  AND [timestamp] <= $__timeTo()
ORDER BY [timestamp] DESC;

-- ถ้า device_id เริ่มต้นด้วย EM500
IF ${site_id:singlequote} LIKE 'T-%' -- ลบ ' ' ออกจากรอบตัวแปร
BEGIN
    SELECT
        [timestamp],
        sd.site_name as site_id,
        temp as Temperature,
        (
                                SELECT TOP 1 
                                    sub.battery 
                                FROM 
                                    em500_pt100_data sub
                                WHERE 
                                    sub.site_id = em500.site_id
                                    AND sub.battery IS NOT NULL
                                ORDER BY 
                                    sub.timestamp DESC
                            ) AS battery
    FROM em500_pt100_data em500
    LEFT JOIN site_detail sd
    ON em500.site_id = sd.id
    WHERE sd.site_name = ${site_id:singlequote} AND [timestamp] >= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeFrom())
      AND [timestamp] <= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeTo())
    ORDER BY [timestamp] DESC;
END

-- ถ้า device_id เริ่มต้นด้วย EM320
ELSE IF ${site_id:singlequote} LIKE 'TH-%' -- ลบ ' ' ออกจากรอบตัวแปร
BEGIN
    SELECT
        [timestamp],
        sd.site_name as site_id,
        temp as Temperature,
        humid as Humidity,
        (
                                SELECT TOP 1 
                                    sub.battery 
                                FROM 
                                    em320_th_data sub
                                WHERE 
                                    sub.site_id = em32.site_id
                                    AND sub.battery IS NOT NULL
                                ORDER BY 
                                    sub.timestamp DESC
                            ) AS battery
    FROM em320_th_data em32
    LEFT JOIN site_detail sd
    ON em32.site_id = sd.id
    WHERE sd.site_name = ${site_id:singlequote} AND [timestamp] >= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeFrom())
      AND [timestamp] <= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeTo())
    ORDER BY [timestamp] DESC;
END

-- ถ้า device_id เริ่มต้นด้วย WS303
ELSE IF ${site_id:singlequote} LIKE 'WL-%' -- ลบ ' ' ออกจากรอบตัวแปร
BEGIN
    SELECT
        [timestamp],
        sd.site_name as site_id,
        water_leak,
        (
                                SELECT TOP 1 
                                    sub.battery 
                                FROM 
                                    ws303_data sub
                                WHERE 
                                    sub.site_id = ws.site_id
                                    AND sub.battery IS NOT NULL
                                ORDER BY 
                                    sub.timestamp DESC
                            ) AS battery
    FROM ws303_data ws
    LEFT JOIN site_detail sd
    ON ws.site_id = sd.id
    WHERE sd.site_name = ${site_id:singlequote} AND [timestamp] >= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeFrom())
      AND [timestamp] <= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeTo())
    ORDER BY [timestamp] DESC;
END

-- ถ้า device_id เริ่มต้นด้วย O3
ELSE IF ${site_id:singlequote} LIKE 'O3-%' -- ลบ ' ' ออกจากรอบตัวแปร
BEGIN
    SELECT
        [timestamp],
        sd.site_name as site_id,
        oz as OZ
    FROM o3_data o3
    LEFT JOIN site_detail sd
    ON o3.site_id = sd.id
    WHERE sd.site_name = ${site_id:singlequote} AND [timestamp] >= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeFrom())
      AND [timestamp] <= DATEADD(HOUR, 7, $__timeTo())
    ORDER BY [timestamp] DESC;
END

/* Grafana Variable */
DECLARE @TargetBatch VARCHAR(20) = ${batch_no:singlequote}; 

-- 1. ดึงเวลา Start/Stop
DECLARE @Start DATETIME2, @Stop DATETIME2;
SELECT @Start = StartDateTime, @Stop = StopDateTime 
FROM sap 
WHERE batch_no = @TargetBatch;

-- 2. ดึงข้อมูล (ใช้ CONVERT แปลงเป็น Text)
SELECT 
    CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), d.[timestamp], 120) AS [Date], -- ผลลัพธ์: 2025-12-12
    CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), d.[timestamp], 108) AS [Time],  -- ผลลัพธ์: 14:30:00
    s.site_name AS [Sensor Name],
    'Ozone' AS [Type],
    d.oz AS [Value]
FROM o3_data d
JOIN site_detail s ON d.site_id = s.id
WHERE d.[timestamp] BETWEEN @Start AND @Stop
  AND s.site_name IN ('o3-windup', 'o3-outside')

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), d.[timestamp], 120),
    CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), d.[timestamp], 108),
    s.site_name,
    'Temperature',
    d.temp
FROM em500_pt100_data d
JOIN site_detail s ON d.site_id = s.id
WHERE d.[timestamp] BETWEEN @Start AND @Stop
  AND s.site_name IN ('t-sat tank-01', 't-sat tank-02')

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), d.[timestamp], 120),
    CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), d.[timestamp], 108),
    s.site_name,
    'Temperature',
    d.temp
FROM em320_th_data d
JOIN site_detail s ON d.site_id = s.id
WHERE d.[timestamp] BETWEEN @Start AND @Stop
  AND s.site_name IN ('th-windup', 'th-outside')

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), d.[timestamp], 120),
    CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), d.[timestamp], 108),
    s.site_name,
    'Humidity',
    d.humid
FROM em320_th_data d
JOIN site_detail s ON d.site_id = s.id
WHERE d.[timestamp] BETWEEN @Start AND @Stop
  AND s.site_name IN ('th-windup', 'th-outside')

-- เรียงข้อมูล: เอาวันล่าสุดขึ้นก่อน และเวลาล่าสุดขึ้นก่อน
ORDER BY [Date] DESC, [Time] DESC;

list.definition:
select Distinct batch_no
from sap
order by batch_no desc
list.name: batch_no
list.query:
select Distinct batch_no
from sap
order by batch_no desc
